snippet.title: Shoppers in Winnipeg Are Taking Advantage of Newly Expanded Sunday Shopping Hours, but Some Say Stores Should Be Allowed to Stay Open as Long as They Want.
snippet.description:
Shoppers in Winnipeg Are Taking Advantage of Newly Expanded Sunday Shopping Hours, but Some Say Stores Should Be Allowed to Stay Open as Long as They Want.
Toegevoegd door tvnportal vorig jaar
Winnipeggers are now able to shop earlier on Sundays, taking advantage of newly expanded Sunday shopping hours, but some question why stores can't stay open in the evenings.Powered by NewsLook.com Producer : CBC
33 views

snippet.title: Olympic City Mega Shopping Center Opens in London
snippet.description:
Olympic City Mega Shopping Center Opens in London
Toegevoegd door NTDTelevision 2 jaren geleden
For more news visit ☛ http://english.ntdtv.comFollow us on Twitter ☛ http://twitter.com/NTDTelevisionFollow us on Facebook ☛ http://me.lt/9P8MUnEurope's largest urban shopping center opens for business in the Olympic Park area of London. Westfield Stratford City hopes to bolster the image of a recession-proof London.Thousands of people lined up two hours ahead of the shops opening to be the first to experience Europe's largest urban shopping mall -- Westfield Stratford City -- the gateway to the Olympic Park in east London.London Mayor Boris Johnson and Westfield Group co-founder and Chairman Frank Lowy officially opened the center on Tuesday, cutting the red ribbon under a shower of confetti.[Frank Lowy, Chairman & Co-founder of the Westfield Group]:"It will serve the millions of people on the east side of London for generations to come. And it will be a wonderful leisure and retail destination for the Olympic Games next year and beyond."The 1.4 billion pound development houses more than 300 shops, 70 restaurants, a large cinema, hotels, bowling alley and casino.It is situated in a deprived area of east London, where unemployment is high.But the center hopes to attract people from all over the capital and from overseas.London's Mayor Boris Johnson announced that Eurostar will have coach trips between Paris and London, stopping at Stratfod, to attract continental shoppers.[Boris Johnson, London Mayor]:"And I'm told already that people on the Rue de Rivoli and the Montmartre, Montparnasse, all the fancy French shopping districts where Carla Bruni shops, I am told they are already excitedly whispering about 'Le Westfield'." Despite opening during the 2008 recession, it's been successful.European economies are faltering and inflation rising to 4.5 percent in the UK, but the Westfield remains confident of success in London's deprived east...
181 views

snippet.title: French court rules against Sunday opening for DIY stores
snippet.description:
French court rules against Sunday opening for DIY stores
Toegevoegd door tvnportal laatste februari
France’s highest administrative court has struck down a government order that allowed hardware stores to open on Sundays. 7-day trading is strictly regulated in France, and the government must now rush to issue a new order to keep the shops open. Also, how protests in Bosnia are focusing on the country's failed privatisation programme.Video provided by France 24 Producer : France 24
27 views
